## 

```{r}
#| label: set up chunk
library(tidyverse) # general use for data wrangling, cleaning, etc.
library(lterdatasampler) # package with lter data sets

data(pie_crab) # extracting pie crab data set from lter data sampler
```

# Exploratory visualization

```{r}
#| label: latitude size plot
ggplot(data = pie_crab,
       aes(x = latitude,
           y = size)) +
  geom_point()
```
